response.overview: Brandon is a sensitive young man who is unsure if he will marry his girlfriend. He invites Tk, the guy he purchased the car from for the road trip, Jera, a young lady he met at speed dating, and Jera invites her friend Natalie from adult magic class. The four drive toward Utah to see the Bonneville Salt Flats. To pass the time the 4 friends talk about each other's lives and joke with one another. Jera tells a funny story of 'the perfect murder' which causes Brandon to tell his own story of 'the perfect drug deal'. The friends quickly realize Brandon's story is very specific and Natalie asks if they are indeed transporting drugs. He admits they are indeed transporting cocaine... they are now accessories after the fact.
response.title: The Journey
